page.title: 20GREAT NORTH RUN,GATESHEAD
page.content: An annual event which has had a great effect on the region is the{ {Great North Run}which is a 13 miles long road race from Newcastle to South Shields. This year,the fifth GNR,25000 competitors took part with the winner,Steve Kenyon taking 62 minutes. The first woman home was Rosa Mota,Portugal's European marathon champion in 70 minutes. The event is regarded as a{fun run}and charity fundraisers,children and disabled people take part as well as top athletes. {CREDITS}Research was carried out by pupils from the following schools: {HIGHFIELD(1,11,14,15) {SHERIFF'S RISE(7,8,9,10) ST.JOHN'S {ST.WILFRID'S(2,3,4,16) {CORPUS CHRISTI(5,6) }Edited by {THE DRIVE(18,19,20) D.McGuire {ST.MARY'S(12,13,17)}
